monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Allows the player to swim - Unaffected by water streams
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Armor Shred
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Blacksmithing
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Draconic Lineage
skills.description: Aura: Each Dragon in the party may receive an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Fire Breath
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Removes 1 Buff from targets - Applies a random Buff to whole party

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Full Offense
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory, Sidekick & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Heat Shimmer
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Ice Breath
skills.description: 5 x 115% (575%) magical damage (water) Removes 2 Buffs from target - applies 2 random Buffs to itself

skills.name: Lava Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Attack) Applies Armor Break (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Lava Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Attack) Applies Armor Break (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

skills.name: Lava Stream
skills.description: 7 x 75% (525%) physical damage (fire) cannot be dodged every hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave
skills.description: 2 x 55% (110%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Bolster
skills.description: Unique Aura: Regeneration (Buff) and Barrier (Buff) also increase Mana regeneration by 10%.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 21. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mighty Boost
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gains Might, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their Attack and 1 harmful Stack is removed.

skills.name: Multi Armor Break
skills.description: Aura: Armor Break (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Reckless Mending
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an ally applies Armor Break or Chill, it regains 3% of Max Health and Max Mana.

skills.name: Sea Rage
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (water) applies Sorcery (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Sea Rage Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (water) applies Sorcery (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Sea Rage Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (water) applies Sorcery (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Sea Rage Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (water) applies Sorcery (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Sea Rage Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (water) applies Sorcery (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Shared Glory
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Glory (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Glory.

skills.name: Shared Might
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Might (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Might.

skills.name: Shared Regeneration
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Regeneration (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Regeneration.

skills.name: Shared Sorcery
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Sorcery (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Sorcery.

skills.name: Situational Support
skills.description: When this Monster uses a non-damaging action for the first time in combat, apply a random Buff on all allies and shield them by 20% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Sorcerous Boost
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gains Sorcery, they gain a Shield equal to 100% of their Magic and 1 Debuff is removed.

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Static Glory
skills.description: Aura: Glory (Buff) also increases non-Critical damage by 15%.

skills.name: Static Mass
skills.description: 30% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a non-Critical Hit during attacks.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Void Flare
skills.description: 1 x 140% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Void Flare Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 80% (160%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Void Flare Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 110% (220%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Void Flare Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Water Surge
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (water) applies Might (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Water Surge Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (water) applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to itself
